Title: Escalation
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Wesley Strick
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Juliana discovers she's far from safe from the Resistance in the Reich. Smith confronts the reality of the lengths he's willing to go to in order to protect his son. And another father - ...
